bittorrent and a router? What router?: cool, what router?  I got mine to get off of the nat errors by telling it to use port 6881 and then having my router have port trigerring for that port.  I also enabled encryption where available which is an option in Azureus.  Lastly, I made sure the IPtables rules I had already made didn't block it(this doesn't apply to you unless you have done some firewall things)
